summary: Julitta, Mogba, & Morwen with all the perks to make them femme fatales.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6]Femme Fatale Follower Pack[/size][/color]

[color=#c9daf8][size=4]Featuring [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77894/?]Julitta[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78187/?]Morwen[/url], & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77719/?]Mogba[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/itvrhqo7b/FFMain.jpg[/img]

[/size][/color][color=#6d9eeb][size=3][b]*Combination Pack of the three followers with [u]added perks[/u]*[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#6d9eeb][b]Non-HDT Version Now Added in Version 1.1[/b][/color]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/kwe5vkyrr/Info.png[/img]
[/font][font=Verdana]Name:  [color=#c9daf8][b][u]Julitta[/u][/b][/color]
Race:  Imperial
Voice:  Female Young Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  100
Body:  SeveNBase
Skin:  Fair Skin

Weapon:  Hunting Grounds Weapon Set
Armor:  Hunting Grounds Armor Set
*She will be Naked & Unarmed in Non-HDT Version*

Class:  Combat Assassin
Combat Style:  Boss One-Handed
Location:  Windpeak Inn (Dawnstar)
Levels With Player. Imperial Traits.
Bonuses to Light Armor, Sneak, One-Hand.  One-Handed & Archery Perks.

Name:  [color=#c9daf8][b][u]Morwen[/u][/b][/color]
Race:  Nord
Voice:  Female Eager
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  100
Height:  1
Body:  SeveNBase
Skin:  Fair Skin

Weapon:  Northern Spirit - Nordic Arsenal
Armor:  Nordic Carved Bikini Armor
[/font]*She will be Naked & Unarmed in Non-HDT Version*
[font=Verdana]
Class:  Combat Assassin
Combat Style:  Boss 1-Handed
Location:  Winterhold - Frozen Hearth
Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
One-Handed & Archery Perks

Name:  [color=#c9daf8][b][u]Mogba[/u][/b][/color]
Race:  Orc
Voice:  Female Orc
Marriageable:  Yes
Weight:  80
Body:  Custom HDT UUNP (SeveNBase w/ Tweaks)
Skin:  Fair Skin

Armor:  Remodeled Armor
Weapons:  Orc with Orcish Weapon Set Replacer
*Vanilla Stronghold Armor in Non-HDT Version*

Location:  Riften (Bee & Barb)
Levels with player.  Orc traits/bonuses.
Skill bonuses to Block, Armor, Two-Handed.  Healing Spell.  Two-Handed & Block Perks

ENB:  RealVision
Tested with AFT & EFF[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/u7iasxypz/FF2.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/p0jq1tk3r/Requirements.png[/img]
[font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE

[/url]*HDT Physics Not Needed In Non-HDT Version*
[/font]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x4ru6k6iv/Recommended.png[/img]
[font=Verdana][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]FaceLight[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75951/?]Fix Lip Sync[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051/?]Are You There[/url][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/qn8xn1w5j/KnownIssues.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]All three together can be hard on certain computers (especially Julitta) so please be aware of your computer's limits when using.

*If You Have The Individual Followers Installed, I Highly Recommend Removing Before Installing Pack*[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fz56o7m6f/Installation.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Manual or Your Favorite Mod Manager.[/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/x7bptea6f/Uninstall.png[/img]
[font=Verdana]Manual Removal of All Femme Fatale files or Your Favorite Mod Manager.[/font]
